title: PM Surya Ghar Yojana: Lucknow leads in rooftop solar panel installations in Uttar Pradesh
description: Lucknow leads in rooftop solar panel installations under the PM Surya Ghar Yojana, launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Other districts like Kanpur, Agra, Varanasi, and Prayagraj are also seeing significant progress. The scheme aims to provide nearly free power supply with substantial subsidies from both central and state governments.
